original: intros w v u l H1 H2 H3. pose (u' := fun n => u n - v n). pose (w' := fun n => w n - v n). assert (H4: eventually (fun n : nat => u' n <= 0 <= w' n)). { unfold eventually. exists O. intros n Hn. split. - unfold u', w'. lra. - unfold u', w'. lra. } apply is_lim_seq_le_loc with u' l; auto. apply is_lim_seq_ext with (fun n => v n + u' n) l. - intros n. unfold u'. lra. - apply (is_lim_seq_ext_loc _ _ _ H4); auto.
